Verses: 1 aandavarudaiya Sinaththin Milaatrinaal Undaana Sirumaiyaik Kandapurushan Naan.
2 avar Ennai Velichchaththile Alla, Irulile Azhaiththu Nadaththivandhaar.
3 avar Thamadhu Kaiyai Enakku Virodhamaagave Niththamum Thiruppinaar.
4 en Sadhaiyaiyum En Tholaiyum Mutralaakkinaar; En Elumbugalai Norukkinaar.
5 avar Enakku Virodhamaagak Koththalankatti, Kasappinaalum Varuththaththinaalum Ennai Valaindhukondaar.
6 poorvakaalaththil Seththukkidakkiravargalaippola Ennai Irulaana Idangalil Kidakkappanninaar.
7 naan Purappadak Koodaadhapadi Ennai Soozhaveliyadaiththaar; En Vilangai Baaramaakkinaar.
8 naan Saththamittuk Kooppittaalum, En Jebaththukku Vazhiyai Adaiththuppottaar.
9 vettina Karkalin Suvaraal En Vazhigalai Adaiththuppottaar, En Paadhaigalaith Thaarumaaraakkinaar.
10 avar Enakkup Padhivirukkira Karadiyum, Maraividangalil Thangugira Singamumaayirukkiraar.
11 en Vazhigalai Appurappaduththi, Ennaith Thundiththuppottaar; Ennaip Paazhaakkivittaar.
12 thamadhu Villai Naanetri, Ennai Ambukku Lakkaaga Vaiththaar.
13 thammudaiya Ambaraaththooniyin Ambugalai En Ullindhiriyangalil Padappanninaar.
14 naan En Janaththaar Yaavarukkum Pariyaasamum, Niththam Avargal Kinnarap Paadalumaanen.
15 kasappinaal Ennai Nirappi, Ettiyinaal Ennai Verikkachcheydhaar.
16 avar Parukkaik Karkalaal En Parkalai Norukki, Ennai Saambalil Puralappanninaar.
17 en Aaththumaavai Samaadhaanaththukku Dhooramaakkinaar; Sugaththai Marandhen.
18 en Belanum Naan Karththarukkuk Kaaththirundha Nambikkaiyum Azhindhupoyitru Endren.
19 ettiyum Pichchumaagiya En Sirumaiyaiyum En Thavippaiyum Ninaiththarulum.
20 en Aaththumaa Avaigalai Ninaiththu Ninaiththu Enakkul Murindhupogiradhu.
21 idhai En Manadhile Vaiththu, Nambikkaikondiruppen.
22 naam Nirmoolamaagaadhirukkiradhu Karththarudaiya Kirubaiye, Avarudaiya Irakkangalukku Mudivillai.
23 avaigal Kaalaidhorum Pudhiyavaigal; Umadhu Unmai Peridhaayirukkiradhu.
24 karththar En Pangu Endru En Aaththumaa Sollum; Aagaiyaal Avaridaththil Nambikkaikondiruppen.
25 thamakkuk Kaaththirukkiravargalukkum Thammaith Thedugira Aaththumaavukkum Karththar Nallavar.
26 karththarudaiya Ratchippukku Nambikkaiyodu Kaaththirukkiradhu Nalladhu.
27 than Ilampiraayaththil Nugaththai Sumakkiradhu Manushanukku Nalladhu.
28 avare Adhaith Thanmel Vaiththaarendru Avan Thaniththirundhu Mownamaayirukkakkadavan.
29 nambikkaikku Idamundo Endru Than Vaayaith Thoolil Nuzhundhuvaanaaga.
30 thannai Adikkiravanukkuth Than Kannaththaik Kaatti, Nindhaiyaal Niraindhiruppaanaaga.
31 aandavar Endrendraikkum Kaividamaattaar.
32 avar Sanjalappaduththinaalum Thamadhu Migundha Kirubaiyinpadi Iranguvaar.
33 avar Manappoorvamaai Manupuththirarai Sirumaiyaakki Sanjalappaduththugiradhillai.
34 oruvan Boomiyil Siraippattavargal Yaavaraiyum Than Kaalgalinkeezh Nasukkugiradhaiyum,
35 unnadhamaanavarin Samugaththil Manusharudaiya Nyaayaththaip Purattugiradhaiyum,
36 manushanai Avanudaiya Vazhakkile Maarupaa
